briefTitle: A Phase 3 Study of BMS-477118 in Combination With Metformin in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Who Are Not Controlled With Diet and Exercise
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind Active-Controlled, Phase 3 Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Saxagliptin in Combination With Metformin IR as Initial Therapy Compared to Saxagliptin Monotherapy and to Metformin IR Monotherapy in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Who Have Inadequate Glycemic Control
summary: The purpose of this trial is to understand if adding saxagliptin to metformin therapy is safe and works better than taking either saxagliptin or metformin alone

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Hemoglobin A1c (A1C) at Week 24, Saxagliptin Plus Metformin Versus Saxagliptin Monotherapy
